mapper.insert: insert into order (order_id, pet_id, user_id, order_quantity, order_shipDate, order_status, order_complete) values (#{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pet_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order_quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{order_shipDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{order_complete,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update order set pet_id = #{pet_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{user_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_quantity = #{order_quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, order_shipDate = #{order_shipDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_status = #{order_status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_complete = #{order_complete,jdbcType=BIT} where order_id = #{order_id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select order_id, pet_id, user_id, order_quantity, order_shipDate, order_status, order_complete from order
